title: Improving Academic Integrity Awareness in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Program to understand the importance of academic integrity in offline environments using digital devices and the uniqueness of online learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately distinguish academic integrity standards in online/offline environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify at least three factors violating academic integrity in online environments by analyzing real-world cases.
Learners can propose at least one team-based improvement plan for academic integrity based on survey results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
